meta.description: High Frontier 4 All icon registry. Maps game concepts to icon files at multiple sizes.

aqua.label: Aqua
aqua.description: Water currency and fuel. Fuel Tanks in LEO are called Aquas.

isotope.label: Isotope
isotope.description: Gold bead fuel for GW/TW thrusters. Worth 10 Aqua at your Bank.

fuel_tank.label: Fuel Tank (FT)
fuel_tank.description: Unit of fuel. Blue = water, Gray = dirt.

thrust.label: Thrust
thrust.description: Base thrust value. Max number of Burns per Turn and landing/liftoff limit.

fuel_consumption.label: Fuel Consumption
fuel_consumption.description: Number of fuel steps expended per Burn.

solar_power.label: Solar-Powered
solar_power.description: Heliocentric Zone modifiers apply to this spacecraft or support.

pushable.label: Pushable
pushable.description: Can use beamed power modifier (+1 net thrust with Powersat).

afterburn.label: Afterburn
afterburn.description: Spend X fuel steps for +1 net thrust (once per Turn).

dry_mass.label: Dry Mass
dry_mass.description: Total mass of all Rocket components and cargo (no fuel).

wet_mass.label: Wet Mass
wet_mass.description: Dry Mass plus fuel. Cannot be less than Dry Mass.

burn.label: Burn
burn.description: A propulsive maneuver expending fuel equal to fuel consumption.

pivot.label: Pivot
pivot.description: Changing direction at a Hohmann intersection (costs 2 Burns).

coast.label: Coast
coast.description: Free movement after Burns are spent for the Turn.

landing.label: Landing
landing.description: Landing on a Site. Net thrust must exceed Site size.

liftoff.label: Liftoff
liftoff.description: Lifting off from a Site. Net thrust must exceed Site size.

aerobrake.label: Aerobrake
aerobrake.description: Landing via atmospheric path. Requires Hazard Roll.

flyby.label: Flyby
flyby.description: Gain bonus Burns (gravity assist) without fuel cost.

hazard.label: Hazard
hazard.description: Risk event requiring a Hazard Roll. Can damage or destroy components.

radiation.label: Radiation
radiation.description: Radiation belt or cosmic ray hazard.

robonaut.label: Robonaut
robonaut.description: Robotic crew card. Can operate without life support.

refinery.label: Refinery
refinery.description: ISRU refinery card for producing fuel at Sites.

reactor.label: Reactor
reactor.description: Power source card for spacecraft systems.

radiator.label: Radiator
radiator.description: Heat management card for spacecraft cooling.

thruster.label: Thruster
thruster.description: Propulsion card. Rocket or Sail type.

factory.label: Factory
factory.description: Production facility built at a Site via industrialization.

bernal.label: Bernal
bernal.description: Orbital space station. Anchored to provide colony benefits.

outpost.label: Outpost
outpost.description: Remote facility placed at a Site.

powersat.label: Powersat
powersat.description: Power satellite providing beamed power to pushable thrusters.

site_astrobiology.label: Astrobiology
site_astrobiology.description: Site icon indicating potential for life discovery.

hydration.label: Hydration
hydration.description: Water availability rating at a Site (0-4 scale).

site_size.label: Site Size
site_size.description: Gravity well depth. Thrust must exceed this to land/liftoff.

victory_point.label: Victory Point
victory_point.description: VP scored at endgame for claims, factories, colonies, and glories.

glory.label: Glory
glory.description: Achievement token worth VP at endgame.

spectral_type.label: Spectral Type
spectral_type.description: Resource class of a Site (C, D, M, S, V). Determines what can be produced.

dome.label: Dome
dome.description: Colony dome type for promotion requirements.

cybernetics.label: Cybernetics
cybernetics.description: Technology icon granted by fulfilled contracts (Module 4).

loyalist.label: Loyalist
loyalist.description: Earth bloc (Module 3 Conflict). Represented by Earth symbol.

independent.label: Independent
independent.description: Sol/Independence bloc (Module 3 Conflict). Represented by Sun symbol.

decommission.label: Decommission
decommission.description: Remove a card from play (free action).

operation.label: Operation
operation.description: A player action that costs one Turn.

free_action.label: Free Action
free_action.description: An action that does not cost a Turn.

auction.label: Auction
auction.description: Bidding on patent or contract cards.

weight_class.label: Weight Class
weight_class.description: Probe/Scout/Transport/Tug classification based on Wet Mass.

categories.card_attribute: Special abilities and properties on cards
